name: name
description: The name of the input, which is submitted with the form data.

name: type
description: Type of input control to render. Defaults to "text".

name: value
description: Optional initial value of the input.

name: describedBy
description: One or more element IDs to add to the `aria-describedby` attribute, used to provide additional descriptive information for screenreader users.

name: errorMessage
description: Options for the error message component. The error message component will not display if you use a falsy value for `errorMessage`, for example `false` or `null`.

params.name: text
params.description: Required. If `html` is set, this is not required. Text to use within the label. If `html` is provided, the `text` argument will be ignored.

params.name: html
params.description: Required. If `text` is set, this is not required. HTML to use within the label. If `html` is provided, the `text` argument will be ignored.

params.name: classes
params.description: Classes to add to the prefix.

params.name: attributes
params.description: HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the prefix element.

params.name: classes
params.description: Classes to add to the form group (e.g. to show error state for the whole group)

name: classes
description: Classes to add to the input.

name: autocomplete
description: Attribute to [identify input purpose](https://www.w3.org/WAI/WCAG21/Understanding/identify-input-purpose.html), for instance "postal-code" or "username". See [autofill](https://html.spec.whatwg.org/multipage/form-control-infrastructure.html#autofill) for full list of attributes that can be used.

name: pattern
description: Attribute to [provide a regular expression pattern](https://www.w3.org/TR/html51/sec-forms.html#the-pattern-attribute), used to match allowed character combinations for the input value.

name: spellcheck
description: Optional field to enable or disable the spellcheck attribute on the input.

name: attributes
description: HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the anchor tag.
